area_portal.name: Area Portal
description: A big portal made out of void. Used to teleport between different worlds.
Always destroys all solar entities held upon travel.

level_portal.name: Level Portal
description: A small portal made out of void. Used to teleport between the hub level and individual puzzle levels.
Destroys all unshielded solar entities held upon travel.
If a portal leads to a puzzle, it has a digit/letter representing it. If it leads out of it, "HUB" is written on it instead.
The hub portals are commonly used for Sun Fragment absorbtion.

sun_fragment.name: Sun Fragment
description: A small piece of pure solar energy. Can be picked up and carried.
Can be absorbed in proximity of a void entity (like a level portal).
Gets destroyed when transported through void portals.
